Sentencas: The primary problem renewable energy systems must overcome is that electricity cannot always be produced in accordance with demand.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: This is a major drawback compared to the on-demand power production capability that fossil fuels offer.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: New technologies can only compete, if a constant power supply is permanently guaranteed.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: This constitutes a critical benchmark that renewable energy technologies must meet, if they are to replace fossil fuels.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (rSOCs) represent a promising approach to counteracting this issue.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: Here we show our developed rSOC plant which incorporates both the storage via electrolysis mode and the electricity production in the reverse, fuel cell mode.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: In order to achieve a high level of efficiency, the plant has been investigated and optimized with respect to internal waste heat recovery and compression.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant

Sentencas: The final plant design shows an efficiency of up to 67.1% in fuel cell- and 76% in electrolysis mode and therefore a round trip efficiency of 51%.
Titulo: Bypassing renewable variability with a reversible solid oxide cell plant
